articles.title: Bob Ross: Happy Accidents, Betrayals and Greed: Netflix reveals grief behind Joy - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: REVIEW: As this occasionally heart-rending tale alleges, America's favourite art instructor was trapped in a exploitative business relationship.
articles.content:
Bob Ross: Happy Accidents, Betrayals and Greed (13+, 93mins) Directed by Joshua Rofe ***½
 He was the showman with a heart of gold. The man with the uplifting, sultry, liquid tranquilliser of a voic… [+4116 chars]

articles.author: Ellen Durney
articles.title: Monica Lewinsky Hired A Therapist To Watch “Impeachment: American Crime Story” With Her In Order To Process The “Retraumatizing” Scenes Retelling Her Affair With Bill Clinton - BuzzFeed News
articles.description: Monica has revisited the darkest years of her life in her role as a producer on Impeachment: American Crime Story, which will detail her affair with Bill Clinton.
